pr_title: [JENKINS-64483] Hide collapse link if it isn't possible

timeline.message:
[JENKINS-64483] Hide collapse link if it isn't possible

Also document the optional 'collapseText'

timeline.bodyText: I can't seem to see this being used anywhere
timeline.author: res0nance
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -39,14 +39,17 @@ THE SOFTWARE.
       (so that the title can stretch to the entire table width.
     </st:attribute>
     <st:attribute name="id">
-      @id of the table, if specified.
+      @id of the table, if specified. Required for a pane to be collapsible.
     </st:attribute>
     <st:attribute name="class">
       Pane table class specification.
     </st:attribute>
     <st:attribute name="footer">
       Footer of the box. Can include HTML.
     </st:attribute>
